languages.text: {n}Ближайший к вам сервитор дергается — и остальные повторяют его движение. Очевидно, что вся группа связана единым машинным духом, работа которого по какой-то причине была нарушена. В одном из сервиторов испорчен когитатор или иная аугментация — поломка, которая в итоге затронула всю группу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ближайший к вам сервитор дергается — и остальные повторяют его движение. Очевидно, что вся группа связана единой программой, работа которой по какой-то причине была нарушена. В одном из сервиторов испорчен когитатор или иная аугментация — поломка, которая в итоге затронула всю группу.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The closest servitor twitches — and the others follow suit. It is clear that the entire group is connected by a single machine spirit, and something caused it to stop working. One of the servitors must have a fault in its cogitator or some other augment — and that fault then ended up affecting the whole group.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ближайший к вам сервитор дергается — и остальные повторяют его движение. Очевидно, что вся группа связана единым машинным духом, работа которого по какой-то причине была нарушена. В одном из сервиторов испорчен когитатор или иная аугментация — поломка, которая в итоге затронула всю группу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The closest Servitor twitches — and the others follow suit. It is clear that the entire group is connected by a single program, and something caused this program to stop working. One of the Servitor must have a faulty cogitator or some other augment — and this breakdown ended up affecting the whole group.{/n}

{n}The closest Servitor twitches — and the others follow suit. It is clear that the entire group is connected by a single program, and something caused this program to stop working. One of the Servitor must have a faulty cogitator or some other augment — and this breakdown ended up affecting the whole group.{/n}

{n}The closest servitor twitches — and the others follow suit. It is clear that the entire group is connected by a single machine spirit, and something caused this program to stop working. One of the servitor must have a faulty cogitator or some other augment — and this breakdown ended up affecting the whole group.{/n}

{n}The closest servitor twitches — and the others follow suit. It is clear that the entire group is connected by a single machine spirit, and something caused this program to stop working. One of the servitor must have a faulty cogitator or some other augment — and this breakdown ended up affecting the whole group.{/n}

{n}The closest servitor twitches — and the others follow suit. It is clear that the entire group is connected by a single machine spirit, and something caused it to stop working. One of the servitors must have a fault in its cogitator or some other augment — and that fault then ended up affecting the whole group.{/n}

{n}The closest servitor twitches — and the others follow suit. It is clear that the entire group is connected by a single machine spirit, and something caused it to stop working. One of the servitors must have a fault in its cogitator or some other augment — and that fault then ended up affecting the whole group.{/n}

languages.text: {n}离你最近的机仆抽搐了一下，其他机仆也跟着一起抽搐起来。很明显，所有机仆都由某个机魂统一控制，但出于某些原因，机魂不再正常工作。其中某个机仆的沉思者或是别的什么植入物肯定是出了故障，这个故障最终影响到了所有机仆。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The closest servitor twitches — and the others follow suit. It is clear that the entire group is connected by a single machine spirit, and something caused it to stop working. One of the servitors must have a fault in its cogitator or some other augment — and that fault then ended up affecting the whole group.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}离你最近的奴工抽搐了一下，其他奴工也跟着一起抽搐起来。很明显，所有奴工都由某个机魂统一控制，但出于某些原因，机魂不再正常工作。其中某个奴工的思考器或是别的什么植入物肯定是出了故障，这个故障最终影响到了所有奴工。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El servidor se retuerce y los otros lo siguen. Está claro que el grupo entero está conectado a un único espíritu máquina y que algo ha hecho que deje de funcionar. Uno de los servidores debe tener algún defecto en su cogitador o en otro aumento y ese defecto ha terminado por afectar a todo el grupo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The closest servitor twitches — and the others follow suit. It is clear that the entire group is connected by a single machine spirit, and something caused it to stop working. One of the servitors must have a fault in its cogitator or some other augment — and that fault then ended up affecting the whole group.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El servidor se retuerce y los otros lo siguen. Está claro que el grupo entero está conectado a un único espíritu máquina y que algo ha hecho que deje de funcionar. Uno de los servidores debe tener algún defecto en su cogitador o en otro aumento y ese defecto ha terminado por afectar a todo el grupo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一番近くにいたサーヴィターがビクビクと震え、他のサーヴィターも同じく震えだす。ハッキリ分かるのは、集団で一匹の機械精霊に接続しているせいで、何かの原因で機能を停めたということ。いずれかのサーヴィターが、考算機か他のオーグメント障害を起こしたのだろう…そして、その障害が全体に影響したのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The closest servitor twitches — and the others follow suit. It is clear that the entire group is connected by a single machine spirit, and something caused it to stop working. One of the servitors must have a fault in its cogitator or some other augment — and that fault then ended up affecting the whole group.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一番近くにいたサーヴィターがビクビクと震え、他のサーヴィターも同じく震えだす。ハッキリ分かるのは、集団で一匹の機械精霊に接続しているせいで、何かの原因で機能を停めたということ。いずれかのサーヴィターが、考算機か他のオーグメント障害を起こしたのだろう…そして、その障害が全体に影響したのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der nächststehende Servitor zuckt zusammen – und die übrigen tun es ihm nach. Die gesamte Gruppe ist offensichtlich mit einem einzigen Maschinengeist verbunden, und etwas hat dafür gesorgt, dass sie die Arbeit einstellt. Einer der Servitoren muss einen Fehler in seinem Cogitator oder einer anderen Augmentation aufweisen – und dieser Fehler hat nun Auswirkungen auf die ganze Gruppe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The closest servitor twitches — and the others follow suit. It is clear that the entire group is connected by a single machine spirit, and something caused it to stop working. One of the servitors must have a fault in its cogitator or some other augment — and that fault then ended up affecting the whole group.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der nächststehende Servitor zuckt zusammen – und die übrigen tun es ihm nach. Die gesamte Gruppe ist offensichtlich mit einem einzigen Maschinengeist verbunden, und etwas hat dafür gesorgt, dass sie die Arbeit einstellt. Einer der Servitoren muss einen Fehler in seinem Cogitator oder einer anderen Augmentation aufweisen – und dieser Fehler hat nun Auswirkungen auf die ganze Gruppe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le servitor le plus proche tressaille... et les autres l'imitent. Il est clair que le groupe tout entier est relié par un même esprit de la machine et que quelque chose l'a rendu inopérant. L'un des servitors doit avoir une augmentation ou un cogitateur défectueux, et cette défaillance a fini par affecter tous les autres.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The closest servitor twitches — and the others follow suit. It is clear that the entire group is connected by a single machine spirit, and something caused it to stop working. One of the servitors must have a fault in its cogitator or some other augment — and that fault then ended up affecting the whole group.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le servitor le plus proche tressaille... et les autres l'imitent. Il est clair que le groupe tout entier est relié par un même esprit de la machine et que quelque chose l'a rendu inopérant. L'un des servitors doit avoir une augmentation ou un cogitateur défectueux, et cette défaillance a fini par affecter tous les autres.{/n}

languages.text: {n}En yakındaki hizmetör seğiriyor, diğerleri de aynını yapıyor. Tüm grubun tek bir makine ruhuyla birbirine bağlandığı ve bir sebeple çalışmayı bıraktığı aşikâr. Hizmetörlerden birinin kavramsayarında veya başka bir ogmentinde bir arıza olduysa bu arıza, tüm grubu etkilemiştir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The closest servitor twitches — and the others follow suit. It is clear that the entire group is connected by a single machine spirit, and something caused it to stop working. One of the servitors must have a fault in its cogitator or some other augment — and that fault then ended up affecting the whole group.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En yakındaki servitör seğiriyor, diğerleri de aynını yapıyor. Tüm grubun tek bir makine ruhuyla birbirine bağlandığı ve bir sebeple çalışmayı bıraktığı aşikâr. Servitörlerden birinin kavramsayarında veya başka bir ogmentinde bir arıza olduysa bu arıza tüm grubu etkileyebilir.{/n}
